parameterdescription.para: SEI ctrl index, such as SEI_CTRL_0, SEI_CTRL_1, etc.

briefdescription.para: Init SEI command or data format configuration.

command or data format configuration sei_data_format_config_t

memberdef.name: sei_set_instr

parameterdescription.para:
SEI instruction operation
SEI_INSTR_OP_HALT
SEI_INSTR_OP_JUMP
SEI_INSTR_OP_SEND_WDG
SEI_INSTR_OP_SEND
SEI_INSTR_OP_WAIT_WDG
SEI_INSTR_OP_WAIT
SEI_INSTR_OP_RECV_WDG
SEI_INSTR_OP_RECV

SEI instruction clock [1] synchronous master clock type
SEI_INSTR_M_CK_LOW
SEI_INSTR_M_CK_RISE_FALL
SEI_INSTR_M_CK_FALL_RISE
SEI_INSTR_M_CK_HIGH [2] synchronous slave clock type
SEI_INSTR_S_CK_DEFAULT
SEI_INSTR_S_CK_TRX_EXCH
SEI_INSTR_S_CK_TIMEOUT_EN
SEI_INSTR_S_CK_TRX_EXCH_TIMEOUT_EN
SEI instruction crc register, such as SEI_DAT_0, SEI_DAT_1, etc.
SEI instruction data register, such as SEI_DAT_0, SEI_DAT_1, etc.

SEI instruction operand. [1] When OP is SEI_INSTR_OP_HALT, opr is the halt time in baudrate, 0 represents infinite time. [2] When OP is SEI_INSTR_OP_JUMP, opr is command table pointer, init pointer or wdg pointer.
SEI_JUMP_INIT_INSTR_IDX
SEI_JUMP_WDG_INSTR_IDX
SEI_JUMP_CMD_TABLE_INSTR_IDX0
SEI_JUMP_CMD_TABLE_INSTR_IDX1
SEI_JUMP_CMD_TABLE_INSTR_IDX2
SEI_JUMP_CMD_TABLE_INSTR_IDX3
SEI_JUMP_CMD_TABLE_INSTR_IDX4
SEI_JUMP_CMD_TABLE_INSTR_IDX5
SEI_JUMP_CMD_TABLE_INSTR_IDX6
SEI_JUMP_CMD_TABLE_INSTR_IDX7
SEI_JUMP_CMD_TABLE_INSTR_IDX8
SEI_JUMP_CMD_TABLE_INSTR_IDX9
SEI_JUMP_CMD_TABLE_INSTR_IDX10
SEI_JUMP_CMD_TABLE_INSTR_IDX11
SEI_JUMP_CMD_TABLE_INSTR_IDX12
SEI_JUMP_CMD_TABLE_INSTR_IDX13
SEI_JUMP_CMD_TABLE_INSTR_IDX14
SEI_JUMP_CMD_TABLE_INSTR_IDX15 [3] Other OP, this area is the data length.
